pokemons.name: Bulbasaur
pokemons.description: Bulbasaur is a small, quadrupedal Pokémon that has blue-green skin with darker patches. It has red eyes with white pupils, pointed, ear-like structures on top of its head, and a short, blunt snout with a wide mouth. A pair of small, pointed teeth are visible in the upper jaw when its mouth is open. Each of its thick legs ends with three sharp claws. On Bulbasaur's back is a green plant bulb, which is grown from a seed planted there at birth. The bulb provides it with energy through photosynthesis as well as from the nutrient-rich seeds contained within.

pokemons.name: Ivysaur
pokemons.description: When the bulb on its back grows large, it appears to lose the ability to stand on its hind legs.

pokemons.name: Venusaur
pokemons.description: Its plant blooms when it is absorbing solar energy. It stays on the move to seek sunlight.

pokemons.name: Charmander
pokemons.description: It has a preference for hot things. When it rains, steam is said to spout from the tip of its tail.

pokemons.name: Charmeleon
pokemons.description: It has a barbaric nature. In battle, it whips its fiery tail around and slashes away with sharp claws.

pokemons.name: Charizard
pokemons.description: It spits fire that is hot enough to melt boulders. It may cause forest fires by blowing flames.

pokemons.name: Squirtle
pokemons.description: When it retracts its long neck into its shell, it squirts out water with vigorous force.

pokemons.name: Wartortle
pokemons.description: It is recognized as a symbol of longevity. If its shell has algae on it, that Wartortle is very old.

pokemons.name: Wartortle
pokemons.description: It is recognized as a symbol of longevity. If its shell has algae on it, that Wartortle is very old.

pokemons.name: Blastoise
pokemons.description: It crushes its foe under its heavy body to cause fainting. In a pinch, it will withdraw inside its shell.

pokemons.name: Blastoise
pokemons.description: It crushes its foe under its heavy body to cause fainting. In a pinch, it will withdraw inside its shell.

pokemons.name: Caterpie
pokemons.description: For protection, it releases a horrible stench from the antenna on its head to drive away enemies.

pokemons.name: Metapod
pokemons.description: It is waiting for the moment to evolve. At this stage, it can only harden, so it remains motionless to avoid attack.

pokemons.name: Butterfree
pokemons.description: In battle, it flaps its wings at great speed to release highly toxic dust into the air.

pokemons.name: Weedle
pokemons.description: Beware of the sharp stinger on its head. It hides in grass and bushes where it eats leaves.

pokemons.name: Kakuna
pokemons.description: Able to move only slightly. When endangered, it may stick out its stinger and poison its enemy.

pokemons.name: Beedrill
pokemons.description: It has three poisonous stingers on its forelegs and its tail. They are used to jab its enemy repeatedly.

pokemons.name: Pidgey
pokemons.description: Very docile. If attacked, it will often kick up sand to protect itself rather than fight back.

pokemons.name: Pidgeotto
pokemons.description: This Pokémon is full of vitality. It constantly flies around its large territory in search of prey.

pokemons.name: Pidgeot
pokemons.description: This Pokémon flies at Mach 2 speed, seeking prey. Its large talons are feared as wicked weapons.

pokemons.name: Rattata
pokemons.description: Will chew on anything with its fangs. If you see one, you can be certain that 40 more live in the area.

pokemons.name: Raticate
pokemons.description: Its hind feet are webbed. They act as flippers, so it can swim in rivers and hunt for prey.

pokemons.name: Spearow
pokemons.description: Inept at flying high. However, it can fly around very fast to protect its territory.

pokemons.name: Fearow
pokemons.description: A Pokémon that dates back many years. If it senses danger, it flies high and away, instantly.

pokemons.name: Ekans
pokemons.description: The older it gets, the longer it grows. At night, it wraps its long body around tree branches to rest.

pokemons.name: Arbok
pokemons.description: The frightening patterns on its belly have been studied. Six variations have been confirmed.

pokemons.name: Pikachu
pokemons.description: Pikachu that can generate powerful electricity have cheek sacs that are extra soft and super stretchy.

pokemons.name: Raichu
pokemons.description: Its long tail serves as a ground to protect itself from its own high-voltage power.
